ja.question: 空室がある場合、その直後のプロセスとして正しいのはどれですか？
choice: お客様に別の宿を提案
システムに予約情報を送信

en.question: Which of the following is the correct process immediately following the availability of a room?
choice: Suggest another accommodation to the customer
Send the reservation information to the system

ko.question: 객실 가용성 직후에 수행되는 올바른 프로세스는 다음 중 어느 것인가?
